name: Mandel AI
headline: AI Procurement Agent for Manufacturing
description: Mandel surfaces supply chain disruptions and supplier updates with email AI. We use AI agents that proactively extract data and email suppliers for order updates, building a real-time self updating supply chain source of truth.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:supply-chain; industry:procurement; industry:enterprise-software; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

THE STAKE
One Email & Spreadsheet Unsent
That’s all it could take for the global supply chain to crash
The way to manage supply chains has not changed since the invention of E-Mail and Excel. 
As Covid proved, in today's global supply chain, real-time visibility and rapid response to issues are critical for the business and the end consumer.
THE STAKE
$1.6 Trillion LostEvery Year
[Recent research](https://www.mandel.ai/<https:/www.accenture.com/content/dam/accenture/final/capabilities/cross-service-group/iconic-thought-leadership/document/Resiliency-in-the-making-report.pdf>) shows that due to uncaught disruptions, businesses are missing out on **$1.6 Trillion** in revenue every year.
For most businesses, the average time from being alerted to a disruption to staging a full recovery is **three months**
THE Supply chain of the future 
Like checking your iPhone
What if keeping track of your supply chain was as easy as checking your phone?
We're building the supply chain operating system that unifies your disparate supply chain data to allow for intelligent monitoring and decision making.
Ready to transform your supply chain?
[Book a call  ](https://www.mandel.ai/<#>)

generated_description:
### Mandel AI: A Breakthrough in Supply Chain Management

**Overview**  
Founded in 2023 and located in the heart of San Francisco, Mandel AI is on a mission to transform the procurement landscape in manufacturing with its innovative AI-powered solutions. As a participant in Y Combinator’s Batch S23, this startup has set its sights on resolving the age-old inefficiencies of supply chain management through cutting-edge technology.

**Core Mission**  
Mandel AI positions itself as an AI Procurement Agent, specifically designed to streamline and enhance the procurement process for manufacturers. Its goal is to create a real-time, self-updating source of truth for the supply chain, where data is automatically extracted and suppliers are proactively contacted for order updates. This moves the needle from reactive to proactive supply chain management, reducing the risks associated with delays and disruptions.

**What They Do**  
Mandel AI employs a suite of features that modernize procurement:  
- **Automated Data Extraction:** AI extracts supply chain details from emails and documents, ensuring no critical updates slip through the cracks.  
- **Intelligent Monitoring of Orders:** The AI actively follows up with suppliers to keep track of order statuses, preventing nasty surprises.  
- **Autonomous RFQs (Requests for Quotes):** The system can engage with suppliers on its own to gather quotes, making procurement more efficient.  
- **Auto-Reconcile:** This feature helps in quickly identifying and correcting discrepancies in packing lists, ensuring accuracy throughout the supply chain.

**The Need for Innovation**  
The traditional methods of managing supply chains—essentially stuck in the era of email and spreadsheets—have proven to be inadequate, especially as global logistics become increasingly complex. Disruptions can cost businesses around **$1.6 trillion** annually, a staggering figure that highlights the urgency for innovative solutions like those offered by Mandel AI. Their mantra? “Never chase suppliers again.”

**The Team**
